```{r}
antropomorfico <- image_read(here::here("data/antropomorfico.png"))
image_scale(antropomorfico, "100")

```

```{r}
statistic %>%
  ggplot(aes(mean_justodoar, narrative)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  geom_errorbarh(aes(xmin=mean_justodoar-sd_justodoar, xmax=mean_justodoar+sd_justodoar)) +
  expand_limits(x=0) +
  labs(x = "Quão justo é doar?", y = "Narrativa") +
  as.numeric(as.factor("Extrema Pobreza") 
```

```{r}
statistic %>%
  ggplot(aes(mean_probdoar, narrative)) +
  geom_errorbarh(aes(xmin=mean_probdoar-sd_probdoar, xmax=mean_probdoar+sd_probdoar)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  expand_limits(x=0) +
  labs(x = "Probabilidade de doar", y = "Narrativa") +
  as.numeric(as.factor("Extrema Pobreza")
```
